ComicInfo.Title: When We All Move to Alaska; That'll Be the Day!; Cracked Looks at Another TV Commercial; Sneaky TV Cigarette Commercials; Public-Spirited Ads; Talking Animals Take Over TV; Shaggies!; How Hollywood Can Appeal to Today's Youth By Modernizing Old Movies; You Know You're Rich When...; Popular Butterfingers; Nixon & Agnew in a Youth Bag; Airpot
ComicInfo.Summary: A police detective finds a popular brand of cigarettes smell so good even a corpse will get up for one.
